title: Gold is forever
creator_credit: Bob Talbot and Bob Talbot Productions
brief_description: A film designed to show the strains, stresses, dedication and training methods of marathon runners. Australia’s Derek Clayton features in the film. Highlights his great effort in the Munich Olympic Games, 1972.
description: A film designed to show the strains, stresses, dedication and training methods of marathon runners. Australia’s Derek Clayton features in the film. Highlights his great effort in the Munich Olympic Games, 1972.
